biotools.summary: Automated Isoform Diversity Detector (AIDD) is pipeline for investigating transcriptome diversity of RNA-seq data. AIDD incorporates open source tools into a static virtualbox to ensure reproducability in RNA-seq analysis. AIDD explores editome by mapping both ADAR and APOBEC editing sites on a global and local level and produces publication ready visualization of ADAR editing landscapes.

bioschemas.name: AIDD
